column4: guys, im having some trouble trying to set my resolution to 1280x1024. I just installed ubuntu and my xorg.conf does not even have a section for resolutions
hi, have you tried doing so via the display tool in gnome
in that case I recommend you tried to upgrade to 9.04 again as it will probably work then
good luck - if it does not work then I recommend you submit a bug at launchpad.net
